text:
The aim of running this test is to automatically create the .csv  le for the
table of database mentioned, using \Auto CSV Generation" and to use it along with
samplers to supply data to samples under use in test.

text:
Thanks for submission.
Unfortunately patch is not really usable as code needs lot of rework.
Regarding proposed feature, this is already possible using JDBCSampler+Setup thread so it does not seems useful enough.
